inclusion.criterion: PEG 3350 (Miralax) is storied to be more palatable and easily accessible over the counter
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who use medications to assist with a bowel movement such as osmotic, stimulant, or cathartic laxatives (including "colon cleansers")
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. He has returned from an international trip few days ago and was living in a camp in Sudan for a month.
